name: Build Trouble
description:
[Made for Let's Create Game Jam #1 - '30 Second Quest']

A unpolished blocky game. 

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to rotate camera
  • Right click to pick up block
  • Left click to throw
  • Q to pause.
  • Complete Statues give you more HP (upper left)
  • Complete chests give you more inventory space (currently no UI)
